Articles.Content:
I've been a member of this community for nearing 3 years by this point. So I want to give my knowledge and experience onto those who need, specifically in the designing of aircraft, and flight.

Those who request training, will be taught how to design aircraft, how to build them effectively to fulfill tasks, as well as make them versatile, and capable of producing aircraft for a wide range of requirements. Trainees will also learn how to operate Kerbal aircraft realistically, in similar fashion to real flight schools.

Trainees can request training for game altering mods (such as FAR), if needed.

To Join:

Simply send me a forum Private Message (PM), and I will contact you as to when I can best run a class with you. If your willing to wait, I can assign you to a class and let you learn and operate with others.

Classes will be taught over livestream, or through live time discussion over discord (Discord channel will be made after first class.

 

 

Datis pinnis ut sapiens est

Edited January 13, 2017 by ZooNamedGames
